Title: The Precious Blood of Jesus
Writer: Bill Dubuque (created by), David Manson, Mark Williams (created by), Ning Zhou (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: When a mobster jeopardizes the casino bill, Marty enlists Buddy's help. Wendy resorts to dirty tactics to get votes. Cade reminds Ruth of her roots.
